importByWordPlaceholder:
หมายเหตุ: แนะนำให้ใช้รูปแบบอย่างเป็นทางการหรือปรับไฟล์ Word ที่จะอัพโหลดตามคำแนะนำรูปแบบ (ประเภทไฟล์ที่รองรับ: docx )
1.ประเภทคำถามที่รองรับ: ตัวเลือกเดี่ยว, หลายตัวเลือก, จริง/เท็จ, กรอกข้อมูลในช่องว่าง, คำตอบสั้น ๆ, Cloze, กลุ่มคำถาม
2.รองรับการจดจำ: ข้อความ รูปภาพ และสูตร LaTex ไม่รองรับเสียง วิดีโอ และรูปแบบพิเศษอื่นๆ
3.ไม่รองรับการใช้สูตร LaTex ในการกรอกคำตอบในช่องว่าง

importByWordTemplateTip:
@@คำแนะนำดาวน์โหลดเวิร์ด
1.ตั้งกฏ:
①ใช้【】เพื่อกำหนดประเภทคำถาม, เช่น【ปรนัย】
②ใช้（）เพื่อกำหนดคะแนน, เช่น（2คะแนน）
③ใช้ เครื่องหมายจุดคู่ เพื่อทำเครื่องหมายคำตอบ, อธิบายคำตอบ, ระดับความยาก เช่น คำตอบ：,อธิบายคำตอบ：,ระดับความยาก：
2.ระดับความยากรวม: ยาก, กลาง(ค่าเริ่มต้น), ง่าย.
3.คำแนะนำจะไม่ถูกนำเข้าเข้าสู่ระบบ (โปรดอย่าลบตัวระบุ) @@
importByWordTemplateWithKnowledgeNodeTip:
@@Word download Instructions
1.Marking rules:
①Use【】to mark question type, e.g.【Multiple-Choice】
②Use（）to mark Point, e.g.（2Points）

note.title: Analytics Rules Explanation
note.name: Rules Explanation

analysis.description: To conduct a statistical analysis of student activity participation, only activities with completion targets set will be considered.

calculationLogic.attendance: The proportion of times a student has attended out of the total number of attendance records. If the teacher has set special attendance scoring rules, please check the final score in the attendance record.
calculationLogic.testSubmission: The proportion of tests submitted by a student (including make-up tests), compared to the total number of tests that should have been submitted.
calculationLogic.interactionParticipation: The proportion of activities a student has participated in compared to the total number of activities initiated by the teacher. Activity types include: Race, Vote, Feedback, and Quiz,etc.
calculationLogic.discussionParticipation: The proportion of discussions a student has participated in (either by posting or replying) compared to the total number of discussions that should have been participated.
calculationLogic.assignmentSubmission: The proportion of assignments submitted by a student (including make-up assignments) compared to the total number of assignments that should have been submitted.
calculationLogic.modulesOrSyllabuses: Total number of scections/units within the course.
calculationLogic.bulletins: Total number of bulletins made within the course.
calculationLogic.inclassReports: Total number of lesson reports generated within the course.

publishedActivities.pre: The total number of learning activities published in the course, which will be included in the statistics once they are published.
publishedActivities.homework: Assignments: The total number of assignments posted.
publishedActivities.exam: Exams: The total number of exam posted.
publishedActivities.forum: Discussions: The total number of discussions posted, not counting the general discussion forum.
publishedActivities.material: Materials: The cumulative total number of materials posted, including: Files, Video, Interaction, Link, Page, Third-party Material, etc.
publishedActivities.interaction: Lesson Activities: The total number of  lesson activities, including: accompanying tests, teaching feedback, etc.
publishedActivities.meeting: Meeting/Live: The total number of meeting/live activities created, including Tencent meetings, WeLink meetings, Ding meetings, etc.

analysis.moduleDescription: Statistics on the basic content within the course

activityCompletionStatistics.description: To conduct a statistical analysis of student activity completion, only activities with completion targets set will be considered. Whether a student has completed an activity will be based on the completion targets set by the teacher.

calculationLogic.progress: The proportion of learning activities a student has completed compared to the total number of learning activities that should have been completed.
calculationLogic.bulletin: The number of announcements a student has viewed personally compared to the total number of announcements published by the teacher.
calculationLogic.discussion: The number of discussions a student has completed compared to the total number of discussions that should have been completed.
calculationLogic.materials: The number of materials a student has completed compared to the total number of materials that should have been completed. Material types include: Files、Video、Interaction、Link、Page、Third-party Material.
calculationLogic.interaction: The number of activities a student has participated in, compared to the total number of activities initiated by the teacher. Activity types include: Race, Vote, Feedback, and Quiz.
calculationLogic.assignment: The number of assignments a student has completed compared to the total number of assignments that should have been completed.
calculationLogic.test: The number of tests a student has completed out of the total number of tests that should have been completed.

attendance.description: To conduct a statistical analysis of student attendance.

calculationLogic.attendance: The proportion of times a student has attended compared to the total number of attendance records. If the teacher has set special attendance scoring rules, please check the final score in the attendance record.
calculationLogic.onLeave: Total number of times on leave.

interaction.description:
To conduct a statistical analysis of student attendance.
To conduct a statistical analysis of student interaction participation.

calculationLogic.race: The proportion of quiz questions a student has participated in compared to the total number of quiz questions initiated by the teacher.
calculationLogic.vote: The proportion of votes a student has participated in compared to the total number of votes initiated by the teacher.
calculationLogic.feedback: The proportion of teaching feedback a student has submitted compared to the total number of teaching feedback initiated by the teacher.
calculationLogic.quiz: The proportion of quiz a student has participated in compared to the total number of quiz initiated by the teacher.
calculationLogic.points: Class performance actual score. It will be announced or not according to the teacher's setting.
calculationLogic.rank: Ranking based on class performance score. If the scores are the same, the ranking is the same.

learningDuration.description: To conduct a statistical analysis of student study duration.

calculationLogic.heatmap: Show the heat map of access/viewing time within the selected time range, with the longer duration indicating higher heat and darker color.
calculationLogic.course: Number and duration of course access.
calculationLogic.audioAndVideo: Number and duration of audio and video materials viewed, including video, interactive materials, and Recorded Lessons.
calculationLogic.materials: Number and duration of files viewed.

homework.name: Assignment
homework.description: Statistics on assignments within the course
homework.publishedCountInfo: The total number of assignments published.
homework.waitForScoreInfo: The sum of the number of students whose assignment is to be corrected.
homework.submitRateInfo: The sum of the number of people (groups) who have turned in / the sum of the number of people (groups) who should have turned in.
homework.avgScoreInfo: The sum of scores for assignments that have been graded divided by the number of assignments that have been graded. "Graded" refers to assignments that have a record of being graded.
homework.avgScoreGraphInfo: Show the average score distribution of all assignments for each student in the course.

exam.name: Exam
exam.description: Statistics on exams within the course
exam.publishedCountInfo: The total number of exam published.
exam.waitForScoreInfo: The sum of the number of students to be corrected for the exams.
exam.submitRateInfo: The sum of the number of people (groups) who have turned in / the sum of the number of people (groups) who should have turned in.
exam.avgScoreInfo: The sum of scores for exams that have been graded divided by the number of exams that have been graded. "Graded" refers to exams that have a record of being graded.
exam.avgScoreGraphInfo: Show the average score distribution of all exams for each student in the course.

material.name: Files
material.description: Statistics on the status of files within the course
material.publishedCountInfo: Total cumulative number of reference activities published and the total number of materials contained therein.
material.waitReplyQuestionsInfo: The sum of the number of unanswered questions in the published files.
material.downloadRateInfo: The sum of the number of students downloading all resources allowed / (number of resources allowed to be downloaded * number of students).
material.perDownloadCountInfo: The sum of the number of resources downloaded by all students/total number of students.
material.viewRateInfo: The sum of the number of students viewed by all resources / (number of resources * total number of students).
material.perViewNumInfo: The sum of the number of resource views for all students/total number of students.
material.perViewCountInfo: The sum of the number of resources viewed by all students/total number of students.
material.perViewDurationInfo: The sum of resource access hours for all students / total number of students.

video.name: Audio & Video Materials
video.description: Statistics on the status of audio and video materials within the course
video.publishedCountInfo: The total number of audio & video materials published cumulatively, including: Video,  Interaction, etc.
video.waitReplyQuestionsInfo: The sum of the number of unanswered questions for posted audio and video materials.
video.viewCountInfo: The sum of the number of student views of all published materials in the course.
video.perViewCountInfo: The sum of the number of textbooks viewed by all students/total number of students.
video.viewTop5Info: Show the names and times of the top 5 materials viewed by students.

forum.name: Discussion
forum.description: Statistics on discussions within the course
forum.publishedCountInfo: The total number of discussions published, not counting the general discussion forum.
forum.attendanceCountInfo: The number of students who have posted a topic, posted a reply, or commented on any discussion.
forum.totalPostsInfo: Posts : The sum of the number of topic and replies made by all students in the discussion forum.
forum.topicsInfo: Topics: The number of main posts made by all students in the discussion forum.
forum.repliesInfo: Replies: The number of replies posted by all students in the discussion forum.
forum.instructorReplyRateInfo: Average of all discussion board faculty response rates, not counting the general discussion forum.

weblink.name: Link
weblink.description: Statistics on online links within the course
weblink.publishedCountInfo: The total number of exam published.
weblink.viewRateInfo: Sum of the number of students visiting all online linked activities / (number of activities * number of students)
weblink.perViewCountInfo: The sum of the number of online link activities visited by all students/number of students.

bulletin.name: Bulletin
bulletin.description: Statistics on bulletins within the course
bulletin.countInfo: The total number of course bulletins created in aggregate.
bulletin.perViewRateInfo: The average of all bulletins view rates.

knowTronClass.title: 3-Minute Introduction to TronClass
knowTronClass.description: Combining various teaching resources, offering over a hundred features. Supporting learning management, MOOCs, SPOCs, flipped classrooms, smart classrooms, and various application scenarios. One platform, providing you with the most interactive teaching experience.

pocketClass.title: Class on the Go
pocketClass.description:
With the mobile app, covering both PC and mobile devices, achieve fragmented learning, store information anytime, anywhere. Homework, tests, discussions, interactions – take class anytime, and stay updated on the latest course dynamics.
Download the app now.

flipClassroom.title: Flip Classroom
flipClassroom.description: Stop letting students learn passively. Through micro-courses, group learning, peer assessments, empower students to actively discover the joy of learning.

effectiveTeaching.title: Worried about the effectiveness of teaching?
effectiveTeaching.description: Through student learning records, grasp the pace of teaching, data analysis allows teachers to detect problems earlier, helping students focus on key points.

clients.title: Customers and Partners of TronClass
clients.description: Grateful for their education journey with TronClass.

feedBack.title: Customer Feedback
feedBack.tkuComment: Simplifying digital learning entry for teachers with a user-friendly platform.
feedBack.fjuComment: TronClass offers convenient pre-class preparation, interactive in-class teaching, and easy course management.
feedBack.ttuComment: TronClass enhances traditional teaching efficiency, keeping students focused and allowing teachers to concentrate more on teaching.

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.slogan: The most versatile teaching assistant, making your teaching worry-free.

blendedLearningPlatform.title: Blended Learning Platform
blendedLearningPlatform.description: A blended learning platform that combines online virtual learning with offline face-to-face classes, integrating various learning tools to provide students with a more diverse learning experience, allowing them to learn at their own pace.

richResources.title: Providing Rich Learning Resources
richResources.description: Teachers can arrange different types of materials, allowing online viewing of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF directly, and downloading files for offline reading. Support for uploading video and audio formats (mp4, avi, rmvb, etc.), automatically converting them into viewable micro-videos.

manageVideo.title: No Installation & Easy Management of Course Videos
manageVideo.description: Teachers can upload videos, automatically generate subtitles and mark key points using AI technology, and edit videos online directly, reducing the workload for teachers. Automatically locate knowledge points in video segments through asking questions, enhance student learning efficiency.

onlineQuiz.title: Online Quizzes
onlineQuiz.description: Easy paper management helps teachers quickly create and grade tests. Students submit answers, and scores for objective questions are swiftly calculated. No more concerns about handling numerous test papers; real-time feedback on student learning is possible. Applicable to learning competitions, fostering more classroom interaction and discussion.

omoSyncClass.title: OMO Synchronous Classes
omoSyncClass.description: Integrate software and hardware for a Hybrid Learning Environment, connecting interactive, video, and recording modules. Merge online and offline for student interaction and collaboration, enhancing participation and outcomes.

interactiveClassroom.title: Interactive Classroom
interactiveClassroom.description: Teachers design engaging content, students participate in real-time activities, enhancing involvement. Instant insight into student learning allows prompt assistance on key concepts.
interactiveClassroom.inClassQuizText: Conduct real-time quizzes, students answer on phones, teachers control progress, view statistics, and analyze results for understanding effectiveness.
interactiveClassroom.groupLearningText: Support group teaching, manage class groups, set assignments, fostering enthusiasm, proactiveness, and teamwork.
interactiveClassroom.saveTime: Save 8 Minutes of Attendance per Class
interactiveClassroom.saveTimeText: Radar check-in on phones streamlines attendance, saving 8 minutes per class for more teaching time.
interactiveClassroom.feedbackText: Communication and interaction during teaching encourage shared thoughts, experiences, and knowledge, promoting deepened understanding.

diverseMaterial.title: Diverse Material & Mobile Learning
diverseMaterial.oneStepManagementText: Teachers set individual or group assignments, request peer reviews, view content and attachments, and use Rubric tools for online grading.
diverseMaterial.autoEvaluateText: Integrate learning and assessment with online quizzes, instant grading, and Rubrics for peer review, simplifying the evaluation process.
diverseMaterial.gradeManagementText: Assignments, exams, group learning performance, etc., can all be included in grade considerations. Automated grade statistics allow teachers to flexibly control the weight of each evaluation activity. Individual items and total grades can be flexibly set with publishing rules.
diverseMaterial.viewTeachingEffectsText: Grasp teaching pace through student learning records. Data analysis allows teachers to discover problems earlier, helping students focus on key points.

moreFeature.title: Choosing TronClass, you can get more.

moocModule.title: MOOCs/SPOCs Module
moocModule.description: One-stop platform to support flexible control of sharing scope for both on-campus and off-campus open courses, facilitating course sharing within multi-school alliances.

compulsoryCourse.title: Compulsory Courses & Elective Courses
compulsoryCourse.description: Automatic import of school courses, integrated with SIS.

onCampusOpenCourse.title: On-campus Open Courses
onCampusOpenCourse.description: On-campus teachers can independently offer open courses, and on-campus students can join.

OpenCourse.title: Open Courses
OpenCourse.description: School-level MOOCs platform where schools can choose whether to make courses available to external students.

app.title: APP
app.introduction: TronClass is a learning management application of Hybrid-Flexible Course Model, which helps teachers and students to complete learning activities and teaching management efficiently, bringing a new experience of intelligent teaching to schools.
app.tip1: The current version of the App only supports Android 6.0 and above.
app.tip2: For versions below 6.0, please continue to use the old version of the App
app.tip4: , which will no longer be maintained from December 31, 2021, but will not affect normal use.
app.homeText: Homepage and application shortcut buttons are added for quick access to recently visited courses and quick handling of to-do items.
app.storiesText: The latest course updates are instantly pushed and reminded. Click on the updates to enter the relevant course page, allowing you to grasp student feedback in real-time.
app.mobileLearningText: You can view reference files, online links, videos, turn in assignments, take quizzes, participate in discussions, and other activities directly on your mobile phone.
app.rollcallText: You can use your mobile phone to quickly initiate digital roll call, radar roll call, and other roll call for absence and leave management, and you can view historical roll call records and results.
app.interactionText: During teaching, the teacher interacts with the students in real time through quizzes, random selection, vote, and quizzes, improve vitality to the class. Random tests and feedback help teachers to check the effectiveness of their teaching in real time.
app.discussionText: Centered around the course content, participants can publish articles to initiate discussions, fostering interactive communication among class members. Through group discussions where everyone participates, brainstorming gain a more concrete showcase.
app.assignmentMgtText: Teachers can create individual or group assignments, enabling differentiated instruction. Students can view detailed assignment information, submit their work, participate in peer assessment, and receive graded feedback.
app.assessmentMgtText: Teachers can flexibly choose between exam mode or practice mode, allowing students to complete online exams or multiple practice sessions on their mobile devices at any time, reinforcing knowledge points.
app.analyticText: TronClass offers detailed and comprehensive learning analytics, recording students' learning paths and proactively highlighting weaknesses and challenges to assist teaching and management tasks.

banner.title: TronClass for Business
banner.subtitle: Optimal Assistant for Corporate Training
banner.content1: Effortlessly manage and efficient learning with TronClass.

useTrainingPlatform.title: Advantages of Online Training
useTrainingPlatform.rapidLaunchText: Help businesses swiftly activate a user-friendly platform for efficient training.
useTrainingPlatform.efficientTrainingText: Manage departmental training, track cross-departmental progress effectively.
useTrainingPlatform.costSavingText: Save costs on organizing events; allow flexible employee scheduling.
useTrainingPlatform.managementResultText: Comprehensive learning process recording for easy evaluation.

useTronClass.title: Advantages of TronClass
useTronClass.friendlyUIText: The platform features a user-friendly interface with simple and intuitive UI/UX design, ensuring a low entry barrier and easy operation for users.
useTronClass.oneStepPlatformText: The platform offers comprehensive services: announcements, course outlines, units, video learning, quizzes, anti-cheating, attendance, grades, analysis, training assignments, certificates, and a control panel. It supports diverse teaching materials for easy personnel and course management, and learning assessment.
useTronClass.mobileLearningText: The platform supports both web and mobile learning, with the app providing real-time access to the latest learning updates for on-the-go teaching and learning. Integration with LINE LIFF services is also available.
useTronClass.inClassModuleText: Instructors can engage in OMO (Online Merged with Offline) classroom interaction, including random student selection, interactive quizzes, in-class assessments, electronic whiteboards, and synchronous video tools, enabling a blended and flipped learning experience.
useTronClass.dataAnalysisText: Complete recording of user learning behaviors allows managers to make decision analysis through data.
useTronClass.videoIntegrationText: Employees can directly use their platform accounts without additional registrations, facilitating easy attendance management for instructors and enabling synchronized teaching in an integrated online and offline learning environment.
useTronClass.environmentText: The teaching management and analytics platform, build with cloud technology, supports both cloud-based and on-premises deployment, ensuring a stable learning environment.
